name: CORRUPTOR (wintrmut3)
description:
c0rrupti0n is a one-card-one-move strategy simulation game about destroying the world.

You control a rogue AI with limited power. Every turn, you can use up some power to attempt to infiltrate and corrupt the technological advances of the day, turning them to evil uses, or you can save your power for more devastating technologies. You have less than 50 years to deplete humanity's [LOVE], and in doing so corrupt the world's soul.

I'll have a devlog up on wintermutedigital.com for more soon! Check it out!
